Hymn.Arabic: وَلَمَّا اقْتَرَبَ مِنْ أَرِيحًا كَانَ رَجُلٌ أَعْمَى جَالِسًا فِي الطَّرِيقِ يَسْتَعْطِي
Hymn.English: 35 Then it happened, as He was coming near Jericho, that a certain blind man sat by the road begging.

Hymn.Arabic: فَلَمَّا سَمِعَ الْجَمْعَ الْمُجْتَازَ سَأَلَ : " مَا هَذَا ؟ ".
Hymn.English: 36 And hearing a multitude passing by, he asked what it meant.
37 So they told him that Jesus of Nazareth was passing by.

Hymn.Arabic: فَصَرَحَ قَائِلًا: " يَا يَسُوعُ ابْنَ دَاوُدَ ، ارْحَمْنِي! ".
Hymn.English: 38 And he cried out, saying, Jesus, Son of David, have mercy on me!

Hymn.Arabic: فَزَجَرَهُ الْمُتَقَدِّمُونَ لِيَسْكُتَ ، فَازْدَادَ صُرَاخًا: " يَا ابْنَ دَاوُدَ ، ارْحَمْنِي ! ".
Hymn.English: 39 Then those who went before warned him that he should be quiet; but he cried out all the more, Son of David, have mercy on me!

Hymn.Arabic: فَوَقَفَ يَسُوعُ وَأَمَرَ أَنْ يُقَدَّمَ إِلَيْهِ. فَلَمَّا قَرُبَ سَأَلَهُ:
Hymn.English: 40 So Jesus stood still and commanded him to be brought to Him. And when he had come near, He asked him,

Hymn.Arabic: " مَاذَا تُرِيدُ أَنْ أَصْنَعَ لَكَ ؟ " فَقَالَ: " يَا رَبُّ ، أَنْ أُبْصِرَ! ".
Hymn.English: 41 saying, What do you want Me to do for you? He said, Lord, that I may receive my sight.

Hymn.Arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُ يَسُوعُ: " أَبْصِرْ. إِنَّ إِيمَانَكَ قَدْ خَلَّصَكَ ".
Hymn.English: 42 Then Jesus said to him, Receive your sight; your faith has made you well.

Hymn.Arabic: وَفِي الْحَالِ أَبْصَرَ ، وَتَبِعَهُ وَهُوَ يُمَجِدُ اللَّهَ وَجَمِيعُ الشَّعْبِ الَّذِينَ رَأَوْهُ سَبَّحُوا اللَّهَ.
Hymn.English: 43 And immediately he received his sight, and followed Him, glorifying God. And all the people, when they saw it, gave praise to God.     Glory is due to our God to the age of all ages. Amen
